title: Arrange Transportation for Film Crew
description: A production coordinator needs to arrange transportation for a 50-person film crew to a remote shooting location.

tasks.description: Get the crew size, location, and required dates from the production schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the necessary logistical details.

tasks.description: Request quotes from several approved transportation vendors for bus rental.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives quotes from three different bus companies.

tasks.description: Select the most cost-effective vendor and book the transportation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the required buses for the shoot dates.
